text:
After a short hiatus the new store is due to open on 1st September. It’s located in the Seng Poh Lanes, just behind the previous location and is painted a bright red. (You cant miss it!)

As always, the owners were warm and welcoming allowing me to view the new space as they were setting up.

I look forward to them reopening as they stock many items that are harder to find elsewhere.
The owner is always friendly and helpful. Glad that this shop stayed around despite closing at the original location. I love walking past with the distinctive red walls.

Good to have shops in the neighborhood to get some essentials.  The owner is very kind.  Payment available in cash or online payment.

Open everyday 09.00 - 17.00 ; closed on Monday.

Will be happy to be back here to buy some stuff.
Old shop, new location! Friendly and warm chat with the owner.
